author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, EXTREME WINDS, AND FLASH FLOODING  CONTINUE AS MILTON MOVES INLAND ALONG THE FLORIDA WEST COAST... ...900 PM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...LIFE-THREATENING STORM SURGE, EXTREME WINDS, AND FLASH FLOODING  CONTINUE AS MILTON MOVES INLAND ALONG THE FLORIDA WEST COAST... ...900 PM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 9:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 9
 the center of Milton was located near 27.4, -82.5
 with movement ENE at 15 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 956 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Milton (AT4/AL142024)
